message: This is my first offer. I'm being generous since I'm not sure how this inflation will affect us later. Let's see what you think.
I'm not getting taken advantage of, let's start with a fair share
I'm willing to compromise, but I'm not going to accept a deal that's completely unfair to me. Let's find a middle ground.
You're getting closer to my target, but I still think I deserve more
This is getting close to my limit. I'm willing to take a smaller share now to avoid the risk of losing everything later on. What do you say?
I'm not budging, I want the majority of the money
I'm starting to get worried about the inflation.  I'm willing to give a little more to get this done.  Let's make a deal before we both lose everything!
You're getting desperate, but I'm not giving in yet
We're running out of time.  I need to take a loss to get something.  This is my final offer.
You're really grasping at straws now, but I'm still not giving in
This is our last chance.  I know it's not much, but I'd rather have something than nothing.  Let's make a deal before we both lose everything.
You're really out of options now, I'm taking it all
